snippet: Manchester United stayed in control of the Premier League by beating Sunderland, 3-1, keeping Manchester City at arm’s length after City won at Newcastle by the same score.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Manchester United defeats Sunderland, 3-1, in England's Premier League; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Manchester United stayed in control of the Premier League by beating Sunderland, 3-1, keeping Manchester City at arm’s length after City won at Newcastle by the same score.

headline.seo: England — United Wins to Hold Off Manchester City
headline.main: In England, United and City Keep Pace
headline.print_headline:
In England,
United
And City
Keep Pace
